trend_summary: Across the series the territory stays mainly rural, yet forests thin steadily while light-colored rectangular fields proliferate. A modest expansion of dispersed villages and connecting roads accompanies this clearance, but no large urban nuclei emerge.
notable_changes: Progressive conversion of dark evergreen woodland to lighter agricultural parcels, especially in central belt
Expansion of patchy field mosaics along eastern and southern margins
Slight growth of scattered hamlets; built footprints enlarge but remain locally clustered
New or upgraded linear roads improving eastâ€“west connectivity
Small waterbodies or ponds appear in northern sector, likely for irrigation
